original_text: In the same way, the people who tell God's good news to others should receive what they need to live. They should receive it from the people who hear the good news from them.
korean_text: 이와 같이 주께서도 복음 전하는 자들이 복음으로 말미암아 살리라 명하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: the people who tell God's good news to others
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 복음을 다른 사람들에게 전하는 사람들은

sentences.original_text: should receive what they need to live
sentences.korean_translation: 살아가는 데 필요한 것을 받아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: from the people who hear the good news from them
